Reviews.Title: Really wanted to like it
Reviews.Author: Albacore Lover
Reviews.Content: I'm a delivery driver and like to stop and take pictures of trains on my route so I was looking for a good travel cam with a wide angle and large zoom, and I thought this cam was going to fit the bill perfectly but it just didn't work out for me. I must have read every review on the web about this cam and wanted to over look what most of the reviews said and hope they were wrong, but they weren't. First off let me say that the build quality of the camera is excellent and felt solid and comfortable in my large hands, but unfortunately that didn't help it take good pictures. I really wanted to like this camera but I just couldn't over look some of the problems.The image noise was bad like most of the reviews said.The pictures seemed too dark compared to other cameras I've had in the past.Quite a few of the shots were out of focus even though it said it was focused when I took the pic.The color red is way too strong and stands out like a sore thumb. Even though it's adjustable in the camera I just couldn't get it right.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected - sorry Samsung!
Reviews.Author: E. Goldblatt "Clearsky"
Reviews.Content: Well, after using the camera for a few days, I'm going to return it! I was so excited about this camera - I thought it could be "the one"! But alas, unfortunately it wasn't. I had been watching this camera ever since it was announced, the day I finally saw it in stock on Amazon - I jumped. Actually, I was a bit upset when I paid over $33.00 for "expedited" shipping (just couldn't wait for regular shipping) and it was not shipped for a week from the vendor. Oh well! One more thing - since I am returning the camera, 6thave.com is charging me 15% restocking fee. I wish I had known this before I bought from them, unusually Amazon products do not have this - again - Oh well! This is the price you pay for trying to be on the "cutting edge"! What a geek I am. By the way - I also own a NV24 and kinda like it except that the sound cuts out when you zoom (that was the deal breaker for me on that).Extreme Summary: As with many of these types of point and shoot cameras - the HZ10W take pretty good pictures in bright light outdoor shots. But indoor - not so good! Video inside or out - not good at all (in my humble opinion). I will only review my negative points here - that's what most of us really want to know.Now for some detail:Still Pictures (these notes are after trying many different settings):1) Lot's of "noise" in the pictures indoor (any setting I tried). I simply could not get a good clear shot.2) Color was not consistent - sometimes way bright sometimes dull (?)3) Some focus issues - not consistent. I know I know - I held it real still - even resting it on the table, etc...4) And something very strange - sometimes while taking a shot indoors, when you press the shutter button to take a pictures, it goes though it's thing by focusing and charging the flash etc., but then when you press down all the way to "take to the shot" nothing happens unless you release the button and then press again - very weird. It did this in about half of the pictures I tried to take. This was very frustrating and I feel if I was at a party or wanted to take a lot of pictures I would miss some good shots.5) Placement of the flash is very bad - you can VERY easily cover it with your finger.6) Sometimes the flash seems to overpower or under power at random shots.7) Very bad barrel distortion - I realize this is a 24mm, but come one! All the pictures look like you are looking through a tube.Now for the Video:1) Indoor and outdoor are not as good at all. Simply, the video is not sharp, even in good outdoor light. Now before anyone say "get yourself a dedicated camcorder" don't even go there!!!! Nowadays when these manufactures say HD I expect HD!!!! In all fairness, I did not hook up the camera via HDMI - I just used the SDHC card and transferred the file and played. I'm sorry - just not good.2) A lot of "focus hunt", especially while zooming3) Placement of the mic's are in strange places, they are on each side of the camera right where your fingers are. Although, the sound quality was OK - I'm concerned that I could easily cover the mic's up in the future - just poor design in my opinion.4) Now for the really bad part, when the camera is zoomed all the way in (normal position - un-zoomed that is) the barrel distortion is VERY bad, it's like looking through a "fish eye" lens. Also, it looks like the image is falling off the sensor because you can see what looks like something obstructing the edge (or peripheral) image. I know my finger was not over the lens, so it must be that the 24mm wide angle is too large for the sensor.Sorry Samsung - I really like your other stuff -  I own two 40" HDTV's and a few computer monitors from you - love them! Maybe my camera is defective - but I'm not starting the game of back and forth - if quality control let this out that defective, I don't want it!All of this is too bad, because the fit and finish of the camera is real nice - seems to be a quality built unit, just not nearly as good as what expected! I really wish these cameras could just work out of the box with no massive adjustments. Check out my other reviews - the Sony T500 still wins!And the search continues........

Reviews.Title: Samsung HZ10W Camera Review
Reviews.Author: David Zachar "David Zachar"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the camera about 10 days ago and I must say I am Very happy with my purchase.After doing online research it came down to the Samsung HZ10W or the Panasonic TZ50. I liked the Samsung more because it had a few more features than the Panasonic. The features were: Samsung has a wider angle lens (24mm vs 28mm) and it also has a manual mode. So far I am very happy with the camera and it takes excellent quality pictures. In the wide angle mode it has a bit of a tube effect in which all wide angle's do. For me it does a pretty good job in low light as well. Would have been nice if they would have included a full manual vs having to go to the web and print one out. Over all, I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend this camera to anyone who wants alot of zoom/wide angle out of a small camera.

Reviews.Title: Really Impressed
Reviews.Author: David "sugarwookie"
Reviews.Content: I just got this camera yesterday, but used it for about 75 shots last night at an function. I have yet to really delve into all of the functions that it has (A vast array evidently, LOL!) however I do know the pictures that I took are really amazing to me. I used the auto mode and set the camera up on Fine mode, which is the next to highest setting. After reviewing the pictures the next day I was really impressed. The one thing that really sort of has me hooked on the camera is video mode. I shot a few videos and had the chance to review them on my laptop and with some decent light you'll be very happy with what you get! My problem was having to tote a camcorder around along with my camera and I'm more than happy with the video this camera produces! I also like the way the camera is made and feels. I was looking at one of the Canon power shots (Can't remember the model) and was going to buy it before I saw the Samsung. Most cameras in the range feel light, and sort of cheap to be honest. This camera is solidly built and I like how it fits my hands. About the only thing that I don't like about it so far is where the flash is situated. It's extremely easy to get your finger in the way and messing the picture up. I'm hoping I'll get used to it soon! I wish I could tell you more about the modes and options on it. The only thing I've played with is the beauty mode and it really does smooth the skin up on shots, very cool! Overall I think you'd be pleased with this camera, I've not even begun to play with it and I already think it's good for the money!

Reviews.Title: pros and cons
Reviews.Author: PierreLeGrand
Reviews.Content: Pros:convenient 24-240mm lens, real wide angle to good tele.compact and portable for such a zoom range.ergonomic, pretty and well constructed.fast focus most of the times.HD video is a good plus.decent photo quality in general (look below).cons:shutter lag in low light.photos a bit fuzzy at high iso.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: M. Perron
Reviews.Content: Quality built camera with great performance.  I use it daily for work and I couldn't be happier.  I was hesitant as I had a Samsung digital camera a few years back and it shot marginal quality photos.  The HZ10w is solid and well built.  The 23mm wide angle is stellar.

Reviews.Title: Good, not great!
Reviews.Author: Amazonbie
Reviews.Content: I was waiting for the Panasonic TZ7/ZS3 to be released.  I was going on vacation before that so I decided to buy the Samsung HZ10W instead.  After taking test shots and movies for 2 days, I decided to return it and wait for the TZ7/ZS3.PROS:- Nice features: 10x Zoom lens, 24mm Wide angle, HD video (with zoom), Good stereo sound, H.264 video format- Price- SizeCONS:- Poor Image quality at 100%.  Detail of images is smoothed away during processing.  OK for 4x6 prints though.- Loud zoom motor sound during video.- Uneven lighting from flash.- Slow refresh rate on camera screen while framing photo.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Alot of people gave this camera a poor rating. I have had this camera for over a year and have really enjoyed it.My friends and I went to a Styx concert recently and she had a Nikon touch screen. Her pictures all turned out fuzzy. I am not a professional photographer but this camera has never disappointed me. I have blown up pictures to 8x10 and there is no grain to these pics. Obviously a there are a few people who don't understand the features on this cameraSamsung HZ10W 10MP Digital Camera with 10x Schneider Wide Angle Dual Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black) I paid 299.00 for this and think it was a great investment. My friend is going to return her camera and buy this one from me because I did upgrade to a bigger mp Samsung camera that really has me impressed.Samsung HZ50W 14mp Wide Angle Lens Digital Camera with 26x Optical Zoom and 3-inch LCD Screen + 8GB Accessory Kit Samsung is under-rated!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Decent,but not excellent
Reviews.Author: Hari Vir "PtTimeGeek"
Reviews.Content: This camera comes with a full manual on CD. No paper printed manual, only a paper "user guide".So, I installed CD, and printed all 100 plus pages to enable me to read it without being at mycomputer. I knew that before I bought it though.The features and performance overall are top notch for the price.Construction quality is decent, not excellent.Treat this baby with care, and it will treat you the same!!!

Reviews.Title: new camera
Reviews.Author: Scott R. Schiffman
Reviews.Content: Overall the camera is a good quality. The instruction manual leaves a little to be desired explaining functions

Reviews.Title: Amazing Wide Angle
Reviews.Author: Kyreland "Kyreland"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a semester abroad in Ireland. I love it. The wide angle lens allows you to capture more of your surroundings with great detail. The camera is a bit larger than your conventional point and shoot, but the additional zoom and features are well worth it!

Reviews.Title: Bad design and slow
Reviews.Author: PAULA SAA PRIETO
Reviews.Content: I still have this camera after but this is not enough to recommended. It is very difficult to handle the camera with out cover the flash, thus many times you have to repeat the picture.

Reviews.Title: Wide lens, yay.
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It takes beautiful pictures. Makes everyone look great, lol. The lighting can be a little bit too bright sometimes, but it's not necessarily a bad thing and I'm sure there is a way to adjust it. It is awesome if you want high quality, dslr-esque photos without the hassle of actually getting a fancy set-up.

Reviews.Title: Use for appraisal work
Reviews.Author: M. Powers
Reviews.Content: Wide angle lens far superior for interior shots.  Would definitely replace with like model if needed.  Great value and utility.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed this camera, very easy to use.it has two image stabilizers making it easier to take the perfect shot. Good Value. Amazon is the Best !

Reviews.Title: Good Buy, Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas R. Weekes "Tweekes"
Reviews.Content: great zoom capability, wide angle is very helpful.  Great picture quality and color saturation

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Doering
Reviews.Content: I do remodeling work and needed a wide angle to get pics for my web site. This camera does the job. Bathrooms are difficult to get good pics of. I can get the whole bathroom in the frame with the Samsung, and from only a few feet away.

Reviews.Title: worthless warranty
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Lee
Reviews.Content: The camera failed a few weeks after I bought it.  I sent it to Samsung's authorized warranty service center. They promised to ship it in 5 business days.  After 4 weeks, I called, and was told the camera couldn't be repaired and they would ship a new camera in 7 to 14 days.  After 2 months, they still haven't shipped anything and their customer service department is no help. They can only e-mail the "exchange dept." to remind them to ship the replacement.  Their warranty is worthless and I'll never again buy another Samsung product.

Reviews.Title: Do not even bother
Reviews.Author: DJOEYK
Reviews.Content: I bought this product and was so excited when I opened and tried it.  To my disappointment, pictures were blurry even if I try different settings.  I returned it as soon as possible.  Very disappointed with this product.  My old Casio Exilim took better pictures than this one.  Of all the items I have bought from Amazon.com, this is the only one that had greatly dismayed me.

Reviews.Title: The VIDEO is NOT wide!
Reviews.Author: Frank Frank "Frank"
Reviews.Content: I was really ticked off when I bought this for the 24mm and found out that in video mode the 24mm turns into like 30mm.Very disappointing.But then the problem with the Samsung nv24HD which DOES keep at 24mm is that it only records 25 minutes.WHen will somebody make the perfect ultra wide?

Reviews.Title: totally works for me
Reviews.Author: ahmster
Reviews.Content: 10x optical zoom, 10 mega pixels for a good priceone drawback is the location of the flashyou need to learn or teach how to actually handle the camera so as your fingers won't be in the flash's way in case you'll need it in auto mode.

Reviews.Title: Digital Cameras
Reviews.Author: Allan Hawkins V
Reviews.Content: A good option instead of a Lumix, but is not the same, Lumix is better!

Reviews.Title: this camera is crap
Reviews.Author: Mar "Marinera"
Reviews.Content: i had for 2 days and put in the box and return it.its crap . bad pictures. all bad ones of kids.i just got a cheap kodak and it does much better job then this one.,no more samsung for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
10.2-megapixel CCD sensor for photo-quality, poster-size prints
10x optical zoom; Schneider-Kreuznach 24mm ultra-wide lens
Dual image stabilization; 2.7-inch LCD screen
Record HD movies in 720p resolution
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory card (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung HZ10W 10MP Digital Camera with 10x Schneider Wide Angle Dual Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Black)
